text:
Follow along with the video below to see how to install our site as a web app on your home screen.

Note: This feature currently requires accessing the site using the built-in Safari browser.
title: Lopez /López (accent on people's names)

og.description:
Hi all,

New to the forums -- whoo!  :)  
I'm wondering about how to know when a written name in Spanish should have an accent -- or if there is a way to know.  Do names typically follow the normal accent rules, or does it vary?

For example, Lopez vs. López... is there one right way to write...
og.title: Lopez /López (accent on people's names)
